accomplishments.goal: Build a RAG system for upper management
contributions: Designed an LLM-based enterprise RAG system that empowered business executives to efficiently search through thousands of internal documents.

accomplishments.goal: Build a segmentation model for detecting vitiligo
contributions: Tracked treatment progress for over 500 vitiligo patients using deep learning and computer vision techniques.

accomplishments.goal: Build a system to search for appropriate medical facilities to conduct clinical trials
contributions: Accelerated the clinical trial site selection process by 6 months through AI and deep learning methodologies.

accomplishments.goal: Build a system to generate KPIs on patient complaints about adverse reactions
contributions: Developed an AI-driven application for patient complaint analysis, leveraging NLP and deep learning, resulting in a 40% reduction in manual data processing.

accomplishments.goal: Build an audio recognition app, similar to Spotify
contributions: Engineered an audio recognition app using cutting-edge AI embedding technology as a core product for a tech startup.
Established a real-time e-commerce analytical system, delivering BI reports promptly and expediting decision-making by over 4 weeks.

accomplishments.goal: Build an intelligent, personalized in-car climate control system
contributions: Conceptualized an app that automatically adjusts climate controls in cars based on personal preferences, leading to safer and enhanced driving experience.

accomplishments.goal: Predict driving destination when car starts
contributions: Pioneered a groundbreaking predictive model using historical geospatial data, enabling next-generation smart cars to accurately anticipate and adapt to drivers' destinations.
Built an centralized MFA system, which standardized software security across the IT infrastructure.

accomplishments.goal: Build a RaspberryPI based system to control lighting in movie studios
contributions: Designed a fully functional Raspberry-PI based control system that significantly enhanced the efficiency and speed of lighting setup in movie studios.
Mentored and guided more than 10 interns and junior engineers across 5+ projects.
Led international cross-functional teams of up to 20 developers, successfully delivering 5+ projects.
Provided technical expertise in implementing and delivering over 12 projects to diverse clients.
Played a pivotal role in establishing and nurturing long-term business relationships with 3 different clients.
Developed a robust system for estimating energy consumption in data centers, resulting in optimized resource allocation.
Significantly enhanced the efficiency of next-generation data centers (DC 3.0) by implementing AI-driven strategies, leading to reduced operational costs and improved performance.
Key contributor in establishing the industry-standard TPCx-IoT benchmark, facilitating fair and accurate performance comparisons across IoT platforms.
Modernized the enterprise system managing 20+ petabytes of data using big data technologies, resulting in a 30\% reduction in operational costs.
Designed an application to deliver targeted promotional offers based on customer behaviour.

accomplishments.goal: Securely deliver upgrades to Snapdragon chipset users over the air
contributions: Developed an application for secure over-the-air (OTA) firmware upgrades, ensuring reliable and efficient delivery to end users.
Introduced an algorithm to automatically scan code repositories and report security vulnerabilities.

accomplishments.goal: Quantify Spasticity in elbow of Parkinson's patients
contributions: Implemented an algorithm to accurately measure the severity of Parkinson's disease, improving diagnostic precision.
Devised a robotic arm for patient measurements and treatment analysis.
